ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 171
ygData.msgSnippet: Now let me get this straight. As i understand it the chance to dual wield is checked every time you attack, right? therefore you should equip a fast PRIMARY
ygData.messageBody:
Now let me get this straight. As i understand it the chance to dual
wield is checked every time you attack, right? therefore you should
equip a fast PRIMARY weapon, the speed of the secondary shouldn't have
anything to do with the chance to Dual, right?

>Message: 2
> Date: Fri, 9 Jul 1999 19:57:41 -0400
> From: "Jason Florea" <jflorea@...>
>Subject: Re: Shield or dual wield?
>
>I found that at level 17, using a fast second weapon, I got to the max (90 I
>think) rather quickly. It was worth it the moment I dropped my shield and
>picked up my second weapon.
>
>Volcar
